pageProps.content:
Experience

Deception Valley Lodge enjoys a remote & isolated desert location on the northern-eastern boundary of the Central Kalahari Game Reserve on one of the largest privately-owned game conservancies in Botswana.
On this staggering 43,000 hectares of pristine bushveld, guests will have the rare opportunity to meet the local San Bushmen of the Naru-speaking tribe, & explore this remarkable environment on foot, while their Bushman guide teaches them about their hunting & survival skills. Learning about the culture of the San people, who over centuries have adapted their lives to survive in the most inhospitable environment, is a unique experience Deception Valley Lodge has to offer.

Stay

Deception Valley Lodge enjoys a spectacular location overlooking a waterhole, where plenty of wildlife activity takes place.
Accommodation is in 8 very spacious suites, consisting of a bedroom, separate lounge, en-suite bathroom & outdoor shower.
The central guest area has a swimming pool as well as multiple indoor & outdoor areas where guests can relax or enjoy a meal.

Activities

Activities offered from Deception Valley Lodge include open 4x4 safari drives in the morning as well as thrilling night drives where nocturnal animals can be found with a spotlight.
A real highlight is spending time with the local San Bushmen, learning about their culture.

subfolders.title: Dinaka Camp
subfolders.description: Dinaka Camp is located on an exclusive conservancy in the northern edge of the Kalahari Game Reserve & home to one of the most unique bio-diversities in Southern Africa. Home to the Kalahari lion, springbok, oryx & brown hyena, this ever-changing desert landscape never fails to impress.

subfolders.title: Kalahari Plains Camp
subfolders.description: Kalahari Plains Camp is situated in a remote part of the Central Kalahari Game Reserve & offers some of the best summer wildlife opportunities on the continent. This 5million hectares reserve is the largest conservation area in the country & one of the largest in the world.  The Central Kalahari Game Reserve is home to the legendary Kalahari black-maned lion & some of the worldâ€™s best cheetah viewing.

subfolders.title: Tau Pan Camp
subfolders.description: The vast & unspoiled Central Kalahari Game Reserve is the largest sand basin in the world & home to the beautiful Tau Pan Camp.   The camp has a unique location overlooking a salt pan & the endless Kalahari horizon, giving it a unique sense of space that is different to any other area in Botswana.
